title: Trek President on Cost of 'Know it All' Strategy
itunes:title: Trek President on Cost of 'Know it All' Strategy
description:
John Burke, President at Trek Bikes, discusses helping customers amid the coronavirus outbreak, including moving bike sales to their web site. He also talks about his book "16 Simple Solutions to Save America."

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
